trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the events that render the background of objects derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理呈现的对象派生自的背景的事件的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripItemRenderEventHandler represents the method that handles the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground> When you create a ToolStripItemRenderEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripItemRenderEventHandler 表示处理以下事件的方法:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground>创建 ToolStripItemRenderEventHandler 委托时，需要标识处理事件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderSplitButtonBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderOverflowButtonBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderMenuItemBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderLabelBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderDropDownButtonBackground> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderButtonBackground>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
